text: @JoeBiden That is a lie. I hope whomever made that just made it up. His record, especially our economy and Covid-19 recovery is excellent- though no liberal blames the riots & protesting for the the increase in cases 🇺🇸 #MAGA2020 #Biden2020 #ThursdayThoughts #FridayThoughts #fridaymorning https://t.co/qxy8BAsfp4
